remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示绑定到和包含要添加和删除分组逻辑的代码隐藏内容。The following examples show an that is bound to an and the code-behind content that contains the logic to add and remove grouping. 如果选中复选框、 的内容按分组`Type`属性。When the check box is checked, the content of the is grouped by the `Type` attribute. 每个组的类型为。Each group is of type . ，以便它显示为指定显示的每个组。The is specified so that it appears as a that displays the of each the group. 在这种情况下，可以是`Work`或`Home`。In this case, the is either `Work` or `Home`. summary.span: 获取或设置交替 对象的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating objects.
The number of alternating objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和附加的属性，可以指定两个或多个交替外观对象。The property and the attached property enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating objects. 例如，可以指定每个第三的交替背景色在。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third in an . 分配给每个中。The is assigned to each in the . 在 0 处开始，直到它递增减去 1 和 0 然后重新启动。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果为 3，有七个中的对象，下表列出了为每个项。For example, if is 3 and there are seven objects in the , the following table lists the for each item. |位置中 Position of in the || |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 有几种方法可用于指定不同的外观的交替对象。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating objects. 一种方法是将绑定中的属性或的到。One method is to bind properties in the or of the to the . 然后，可以使用以指定应将哪些值应用于具有特定值。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the that has a certain value. 此外可以使用触发器根据的值的属性值更改其。You can also use triggers to change the value of a property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例创建绑定到集合中的项进行分组。The following example creates a that is bound to a that groups the items in the collection. 该示例交替的每个标头的背景之间通过执行以下两种颜色：The example alternates the background for the header of each between two colors by doing the following: - 集为 2。Sets to 2. - 创建，它返回，具体的值取决于。Creates an that returns a , depending on the value of . - 将绑定的中到属性，并提供。Binds the of the in the to the property and provides the . 请注意，上设置附加的属性，并绑定使用若要获取其值。Note that the attached property is set on the , and the binding uses to get its value. 该示例还交替中的项的背景通过设置三种颜色之间上和绑定每个到。The example also alternates the background of the items in the between three colors by setting the on the and binding the of each to the . 在这种情况下，在后台三种颜色之间交替。In this case, the background alternates between three colors. ，组项不会显示。The that groups the items is not shown. 有关如何组项的信息，请参阅[如何： 进行排序和组数据使用 XAML 中的视图](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。For information on how to group item, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md). [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是极少数情况创建属性元素语法而不是创建为资源，样式中的以内联方式是合理的一种替代方法。This property is a rare case where creating a inline in property element syntax, rather than creating the style as a resource, is a reasonable alternative methodology. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果标题显示为字符串，应如何设置该标题的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果标题显示为字符串，应如何设置该标题的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您设置或的属性，则属性将被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，按价格范围进行分组的项的集合。The following example creates a that groups a collection of items by price range. 使用转换器， `GroupByPrice`，返回每个项的价格是一个整数值。The converter, `GroupByPrice`, returns an integer value that is above each item's price. 例如，如果项的价格是介于 0 和 100 之间，则转换器会返回 100。For example, if an item's price is between 0 and 100, the converter returns 100. 该示例使用创建包含每个价格范围的上限值的字符串。The example uses the to create a string that includes the upper limit for each price range. 例如，在美国，低于 100 美元的项分组在说"少于 100 美元的项"标题下。For example, in the United States, items that are under 100 dollars are grouped under a heading that says "Items under $100". [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleHeaderStringFormat](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#groupstyleheaderstringformat)] 下面的示例演示`GroupByPrice`类，`PurchaseItem`类和集合的绑定到。The following example shows the `GroupByPrice` class, the `PurchaseItem` class, and the collection that the is bound to. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#groupstyledata)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#groupstyledata)]
